articles.title: Longer between-dose intervals for COVID-19 vaccines may significantly reduce mortality - News-Medical.net
articles.description: A recent study, currently available on the medRxiv* preprint server, has shown how longer dosing intervals of vaccines against coronavirus disease (COVID-19) may be able to minimize mortality in low- and middle-income countries in the WHO European region – an…
